description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen, specifically a Search Screen widget that allows users to search songs by title or artist within a music streaming app. It manages user input, filters song list results dynamically, and navigates to a player screen when a song is selected.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget providing a search interface for songs, allowing users to search by title or artist.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the search query, filtered results, and UI of SearchScreen.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the search screen, including the text input and results list.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the SearchScreen widget.
